name: Pesh Addiction, Lesser
source: Dark Markets - A Guide to Katapesh pg. 57
components: V, M (a dose of pesh whey)
target: one living creature with 7 HD or less
text: This spell functions like lesser geas, except the only allowed command is “use pesh or refined pesh.”
components_zh: 语言、材料 (一剂仙人掌粹乳清)
duration_zh: 1天/等级 或 直至能量发散 (可解消)
text_zh: 此法术之运作与次级指使术(lesser geas)相似，除了唯一能指使的命令是「吸食仙人掌粹或是精炼仙人掌粹」。
